item.name: Sands of Time
item.desc: Use these to speed up production or training! Uses 1 for every hour.
item.useinfo: Used to speed up various activities. Click on the 'Skip' option to use. Every sand of time can speed up 1 hour worth of production.

item.name: Extra Taxation Tool
item.desc: Use it to collect extra Gold after you have already taxed 3x today
item.useinfo: Used to collect extra taxes from the Castle. After you have collect taxes from the castle 3 times for free, click on the 'Extra' button on the castle to use.

item.name: Spyglass
item.desc: View battlefields obscured by Fog of War
item.useinfo: Used to reveal the fog of war on battlefields. Click on the 'Detect' button at the beginning of battle to use.

item.name: Login Treasure Chest
item.desc: Shoot down the flying chest to receive daily rewards!

item.name: Flying Chest
item.desc: Visit your top 10 friends and shoot down their flying chests. Big rewards inside!

item.desc: Used by Heroes at lvl 6, adds 43 attack power.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Sword of Damocles
item.desc: Used by Heroes at lvl 16, adds 55 attack power.
item.story: The very sword that king Dionysius hung over Damocles by a horsehair, warning the owner of the danger that comes with power.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Sword of Flame
item.desc: Used by Heroes at lvl 26, adds 67 attack power.
item.story: Sword of flame forged by Volund in Norse mythology. The fire giant Surtr used this sword to first slay Freyr during Ragnarok, then destroyed the world tree and the universe.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Long Stinger
item.desc: Used by Infantry at lvl 36, adds 79 attack power.
item.story: A terrible weapon having a vicious sharp edge combined with the hypertoxic blood of the Hydra.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Spear of Morningstar
item.desc: Used by Spearmen at lvl 36, adds 79 attack power.
item.story: Weapon used by Lucifer, the Star of Dawn, who lead a third of all angels to rebel against the Messiah. It has very strong destructive powers.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Sword of Helgi
item.desc: Used by Heroes at lvl 36, adds 79 attack power
item.story: A great sword engraved with snakes and magical runes. Given to him by his future wife, the valkyrie Sváfa, the norse hero Helgi used this sword to slay King Hróðmarr and avenged his grandfather.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Bow of Vali
item.desc: Used by Ranged at lvl 36, adds 79 attack power.
item.story: Bow used by Vali, the god of nature in Norse mythology. Born of Odin and Rind, he grew up in one day in order to slay Hoder, the god of darkness as revenge for Baldur, the god of light.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Phoenix Staff
item.desc: Used by Mages at lvl 36, adds 79 attack power.
item.story: A magic wand with strong magical powers. Made by ancient celtic druids from cherished phoenix tail feathers and poincianas.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Blade of Hera
item.desc: Used by Infantry at lvl 46, adds 91 attack power.
item.story: Though she does not often participate in direct combat, the goddess Hera armed with her deadly blade and battle dress showed extraordinary power during the battle with the giants, and slew Phoitios during the war.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Giant Halberd
item.desc: Used by Spearmen at lvl 46, adds 91 attack power.
item.story: Giant halberd used by Atlas the Titan in the war against the olympians. After the failed war, Atlas was punished to forever uphold the celestial sphere on his shoulders.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Tyrfing Sword
item.desc: Used by Heroes at lvl 46, adds 91 attack power
item.story: King Sigrlami, the grandson of Odin, trapped and forced two dwarves to make him a magical sword that could cut through iron and never missed a strike. The Dwarves cursed the sword upon completion, forcing it to kill a man everytime it is drawn, eventully killing King Sigrlami himself.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Repeating Crossbow
item.desc: Used by Ranged at lvl 46, adds 91 attack power.
item.story: Wielded to devstating effects by Phoebe, one of the original Titans of greek mythology and the grandmother of Apollo and Artemis.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Dragon Horn Staff
item.desc: Used by Mages at lvl 46, adds 91 attack power.
item.story: A unique magic wand, made by ancient Celtic druids with a rare dragon horn and elderberries.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Damascus Blade
item.desc: Used by Infantry at lvl 56, adds 103 attack power.
item.story: Cast from steel wootz ingots and featured with distinctive water like patterns, these famed blades of history could easily cut through steel.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Poseidon's Trident
item.desc: Used by Spearmen at lvl 56, adds 103 attack power.
item.story: The weapon of Poseidon, the god of the sea in Greek mythology. Having a long spear in the middle, and two shorter forks on the side, Posiedon was able to use this weapon to cause earthquakes and floods.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Sword of Gram
item.desc: Used by Heroes at lvl 56, adds 103 attack power
item.story: Appearing in the Poetic Edda and Volsunga saga of Norse mythology, Siegfried used this sword of wrath to slay the dragon Fafnir.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Light of Dawn
item.desc: Used by Ranged at lvl 56, adds 103 attack power.
item.story: In Greek mythology, no one surpassed the archery skills of the sun god Apollo. Riding the sun chariot and carrying the light of dawn whenever he appeared on the battlefield.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Stary Harp
item.desc: Used by Mages at lvl 56, adds 103 attack power.
item.story: Given to Hypnos the god of sleep as a gift from the Muses. It can play enchanting tunes and holds strong magical powers.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Ghost Kris
item.desc: Used by Infantry at lvl 66, adds 115 attack power.
item.story: Weapon owned by the god of evil Ahriman in ancient Mesopotamian, its serpentine blade corrupting and poisoning the souls of all mankind.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Spear of Fortune
item.desc: Used by Spearmen at lvl 66, adds 115 attack power.
item.story: The lance of Longinus - The legendary spear that pierced through Jesus Christ at the crucifixion. This holy relic became lost in history, only to surface again here.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Hrunting Sword
item.desc: Used by Heroes at lvl 66, adds 115 attack power
item.story: Sword belonging to the Scandinavian hero Beowulf, who defeated the half-man and half-devil monster known as Grendel, and his mother the water witch.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Bow of the Seraphim
item.desc: Used by Ranged at lvl 66, adds 115 attack power.
item.story: Bows used by the burning ones to fight off demonic forces, shooting out red lights like beams across the sky.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Staff of Shadow
item.desc: Used by Mages at lvl 66, adds 115 attack power.
item.story: A evil wand that surfaced time and again throughout history. Made by the ancient Celtic druids out of yew and dark curses, it has only ever brought darkness and despair.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Harbinger of Doom
item.desc: Used by Infantry at lvl 76, adds 127 attack power.
item.story: Also known as the blade of death, This giant claymore was owned by Ker, the daughter of Nyx and the Fate of death. It can rend judgement on anyone it touches, bringing their life to a tragic and violent end.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Gae Bolg
item.desc: Used by Spearmen at lvl 76, adds 127 attack power.
item.story: The Irish hero Cu Chulainn received this powerful spear from Scathach after passing her martial arts training in the fort of shadows. Though always deadly when thrown, it has tragically only taken the lives of Cu Chulainn's brother and son.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Durendal
item.desc: Used by Heroes at lvl 76, adds 127 attack power
item.story: Holy sword forged by Wayland, the smith of legend. Charlemagne gave this sword to his loyal knight Roland, which he used to win numerous victories and to hold back a fierce army of 400,000.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Breath of Lava
item.desc: Used by Ranged at lvl 76, adds 127 attack power.
item.story: A magical bow made by the titan Gaia out of lava. It had extraordinary destructive powers.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Staff of Torrential Storms
item.desc: Used by Mages at lvl 76, adds 127 attack power.
item.story: Legend said when Odin hung upside down from the World Tree, he learned the power of the runes and carved them on a branch he took from the tree. It embued the branch with powerful magical powers.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Hermes' Axe
item.desc: Used by Infantry at lvl 86, adds 139 attack power.
item.story: Gold and silver axes given to honest heroes by the god Hermes.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Purgatory Arahan Spear
item.desc: Used by Spearmen at lvl 86, adds 139 attack power.
item.story: Forged in the cold flames of purgatory, this powerful lance is capable of burning away all evil in the world.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Excalibur
item.desc: Used by Heroes at lvl 86, adds 139 attack power.
item.story: Pulled from the stone by Arthur the rightful king, this legendary blade has a gemstone decorated hilt and could easily cut through iron.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Bow of Chamuel
item.desc: Used by Ranged at lvl 86, adds 139 attack power.
item.story: The bow of archangel Chamuel; He expelled Adam from the garden of eden and guards Heaven's gate in order to atone for humanity's sins.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Staff of Niflheim
item.desc: Used by Mages at lvl 86, adds 139 attack power.
item.story: The ice staff held by Ymir, the primordial being who fathered all giant kind. It grants great spiritual powers to all who holds it.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Axe of Eternal Mourning
item.desc: Used by Infantry at lvl 96, adds 151 attack power.
item.story: Battleaxe belonging to Doumah, prince of Hell and guardian of the 14th gate. It’s said that the soul of those killed by this axe will meet Doumah, the angel of silence.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Eternal Spear
item.desc: Used by Spearmen at lvl 96, adds 151 attack power.
item.story: Also known as Gungnir, this legendary item was the weapon of choice of the Norse god Odin. Made from the world tree and inscribed with magical runes, this weapon never misses its target.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Sword of Blazing Fury
item.desc: Used by Heroes at lvl 96, adds 151 attack power.
item.story: This powerful sword was made by the archangel Uriel. It has the power to frighten off demons. Even Satan is unwilling to face it.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Retribution
item.desc: Used by Ranged at lvl 96, adds 151 attack power.
item.story: Blessed by the Erinyes to seek out revenge, this gun's victims are not only tortured by physical pain, but also suffer continously through the anguish of past guilts.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Wand of Final Repose
item.desc: Used by Mages at lvl 96, adds 151 attack power.
item.story: Wand held by Hela, queen of Hel and receiver of the dead in Norse mythology. This horrific wand is filled with the regrets of the dead, and possesses powerful black magic.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the weapon to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Leyding Armor
item.desc: Used by Heroes at lvl 16, adds 55 defense.
item.story: The nordic gods built a solid iron chain called Leyding to bind the great wolf Fenrir. After Fenrir broke the chain, its debris were gathered together and cast into this armor.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the armor to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Armor of Dromi
item.desc: Used by Heroes at lvl 26, adds 67 defense.
item.story: The nordic gods built a chain called Dromi that was twice as strong as Leyding to bind Fenrir. It still could not resist the power of the great wolf and was broken into pieces. Its pieces were gathered together and cast into this armor.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the armor to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Gleipnir
item.desc: Used by Heroes at lvl 36, adds 79 defense.
item.story: In order to finally conquer Fenrir, the nordic gods forged a strong, magical rope named Gleipnir with the help of the dwarves. The unused materails from the forging were used to cast this armor.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the armor to equip it on your selected hero.

item.desc: Used by Heroes at lvl 46, adds 91 defense.

item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the armor to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Megingiord
item.desc: Used by Heroes at lvl 56, adds 103 defense.
item.story: Armor sharing the same name as Thor's belt, it is made with the same material.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the armor to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Blood of Fafnir
item.desc: Used by Heroes at lvl 66, adds 115 defense.
item.story: In Nordic myth, when Siegfried killed the dragon Fafnir, he gained an indestructable body by bathing in its blood. What was left of the blood was collected and made into this armor.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the armor to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Aegis of the Goddess
item.desc: Used by Heroes at lvl 76, adds 127 defense.
item.story: The Aegis was forged by Hephaestus, smith of the Gods. It was filled with godly magic and served to protect Athena in battle.
item.useinfo: Used to equip a hero on the hero screen. Click on the armor to equip it on your selected hero.

item.name: Armor of Raphael
item.desc: Used by Heroes at lvl 86, adds 139 defense.
